attributes.action: Stop the Northstowe development near Cambridge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a new town of considerable size being built within extreme close proximity to Oakington and Longstanton.  This petition is especially in light of the additional 2,000 homes (recommended by the Independent planning inspectors -reported in the news on 1st March 2007).  On top of the existing plans already submitted.
